# Integration weights for the "Fixed order k=3" formula over the reference triangle [(0, 0), (1, 0), (0, 1)].
# The integration point coordinates (x_i, y_i, z_i) are barycentric i.e. x_i + y_i + z_i = 1.
# For the reference triangle, \int f(r) dr is approximated by \sum_i w_i f((y_i, z_i))
# 
# w_i x_i y_i z_i
-2.812500000000000000e-01 3.333333333333333148e-01 3.333333333333333148e-01 3.333333333333333148e-01
2.604166666666666852e-01 2.000000000000000111e-01 2.000000000000000111e-01 5.999999999999999778e-01
